topics.body:
So there  is this shop in town called Gags and Giggles
Now you would think that's a comedy store
But according to my brother it's apparently a sex shop

That's not a good name for sex shop
Someone is going to make a terrible mistake

Glad to know there might an actual sex shop in town though
